meanings.sent1: The teacher redistributes the crayons to the students.
meanings.sent2: The charity redistributes food to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The magician redistributes the cards in a surprising way.
meanings.sent4: The wind redistributes the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The chef redistributes the toppings evenly on the pizza.

meanings.definition: To divide up and give out in shares.
meanings.sent1: The company redistributes the profits among its employees.
meanings.sent2: The government redistributes resources to support various programs.
meanings.sent3: The siblings redistribute the candies among themselves.
meanings.sent4: The sun redistributes its warmth to all corners of the Earth.
meanings.sent5: The farmer redistributes the seeds evenly in the field.
